Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.phase.action.states.cards

Class StudentMovementCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.phase.action.ActionPhaseState
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.phase.action.states.CharacterCard
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.phase.action.states.cards.StudentMovementCard
public class StudentMovementCard extends CharacterCard
1st type of Character card, this card decors the action phase's StudentMovement State, modelling all student movement related character card behaviours.
